high_descs: Turn right and walk ahead a small bit and enter the second doorway on the right, going straight towards the shelves.
Turn back around and approach the doorway you came in through, stopping at the drawers on the right.
Turn on the lamp atop the drawers.
anns.task_desc: Hold up a salt shaker to a lit lamp.

high_descs: Turn around. move forward, enter the room, move straight towards the shelf.
Take the salt shaker from the shelf.
Turn around, move towards the door, turn right towards the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: To take the salt shaker, put the desk lamp on.

high_descs: Turn around and head straight, then proceed to turn left towards the table
Pick up salt shaker from the table
Head towards the door, then hang a left and go to the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a salt shaker by the light of a desk lamp
